officialTitle: Azithromycin to Prevent Post-discharge Morbidity and Mortality in Kenyan Children
inclusionCriteria:
* Age 1-59 months,
* Plan to remain in study area greater than 6 months
* Discharged from hospital following non-trauma related admission
* Must have minimum age of 1 Month
* Must have maximum age of 59 Months
exclusionCriteria: * Contraindication to azithromycin use and other prophylactic antibiotic use
